articles.title: China tells EU it will pursue Ukraine peace in its own way - Reuters
articles.description: China offered the European Union assurances on Friday that it would seek peace in Ukraine but said this would be on its own terms, deflecting pressure for a tougher stance towards Russia.
articles.content: BRUSSELS/BEIJING, April 1 (Reuters) - China offered the European Union assurances on Friday that it would seek peace in Ukraine but said this would be on its own terms, deflecting pressure for a toug… [+3739 chars]

articles.title: European inflation soars to record 7.5 percent on fuel, food costs - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Inflation in Europe has soared to another record. It's a fresh sign that rising energy prices fueled by Russia's war in Ukraine are squeezing consumers and adding pressure on the central bank to raise interest rates.
